name: My Horse and Me: Riding for Gold
name_original: My Horse and Me: Riding for Gold
description:
Packed with exciting new features, brand new graphics and animations,
and an engrossing storyline, horse sports fans will be treated to the
most complete equestrian experience and the most realistic horse
simulation ever seen in a game. My Horse and Me: Riding for Gold will
let players live the ultimate bond between them and their horse. The My
Horse and Me series boasts the exclusive worldwide license from the
Fédération Equestre Internationale (FEI), the world's leading horse
sports organisation.

Features

• Ride, train, and care for your own horse - share a special bond
•
Over 15 riding and grooming mini games
• Nearly 30 competitions -
ride tracks based on real world courses
• Custom horse, apparel, and
style options
• Multi-player options
